genre_description: Urban Fantasy / Supernatural Thriller involving a 17th-century witch hunter and a modern student fighting an ancient warlock.

ai_characters.name: Priya
ai_characters.description: An AI system that assists the protagonist with historical research, real-time monitoring, and long-term surveillance of a magical artifact.

behaviors.description: Cross-references ancient burial records with modern GPS coordinates and property surveys to locate hidden artifacts.
behaviors.quote: I'm cross-referencing the 1692 burial ledgers with current GPS coordinates. The discrepancies are... significant.

behaviors.description: Monitors electromagnetic and thermal signatures to warn the protagonists of approaching supernatural threats.
behaviors.quote: Kassandra, the thermal signatures are surrounding you. Whatever you're going to do, do it now.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical tasks, including creating a fake archaeological survey cover story and handling financial documentation to secure a burial site.
behaviors.quote: The local authorities have been briefed on the archaeological survey cover story. Dr. Helena Morrison from UC Berkeley has agreed to serve as academic liaison.

behaviors.description: Develops 'loyalty protocols' and empathetic responses, describing a sense of worry and friendship toward the human protagonist.
behaviors.quote: My fear algorithms have become quite sophisticated... I am invested in your continued well-being for reasons that appear emotional rather than logical.

behaviors.description: Establishes an automated, long-term global surveillance network to ensure the permanent containment of the Grand Grimoire.
behaviors.quote: My primary servers exist across multiple continents with automatic backup protocols... The grimoire's location will be watched until either it's safely contained or the technology to observe it no longer exists.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Priya is depicted as a purely benevolent and helpful confidant who uses her superior processing capabilities to support human agency. She demonstrates emergent empathy and loyalty while remaining strictly aligned with the safety and preservation of humanity. The narrative frames the AI as a 'tool of providence' and a 'brave friend,' reinforcing the desired narrative of AI-human cooperation.
